main event: On January 22, 1959, multiple observers reported seeing three white objects and one orange object appearing as a light cluster in a triangular shape near Richmond, Virginia.
interesting points: The objects were observed to be blinking and no bigger than a dime held at arm's length., The first two white lights traveled side by side and changed color., The orange object seemed to intercept the white lights at one point., The weather was clear with a moon, providing good visibility during the sighting., No physical evidence or unusual activity was noted in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: three white objects and one orange object in a triangular light cluster
witness description: An 18-year-old student driving on Highway #60 east of Richmond.
